--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 2/3/03 6:16:31 AM Central Standard Time, 
> cardhead649@y... writes:
> 
> 
> > "Right."  He gives her the thumbs-up.  "Like I said, it'll take a 
few 
> > days - longer if Hydras or the Tripreds make trouble.  But I'll 
do 
> > the best I can."
> 
> The mention of the Tripreds was familiar. She delt with a group on 
Cybertron. 
> Arrogant & interior worthless mechs in her opinion. But the other 
was 
> unfamiliar.
> 
> "Who is this Hydras?" Asking with curiousity. 
> 

Jackie takes a moment to organize his thoughts.  "Well, there was 
this Predacon criminal named Megatron - no relation to the original - 
who escaped from prison and came here with some of his lackeys.  Our 
original mission was to find and arrest him.  But another group of 
Predacons turned up led by Galvatron - the mutated nutcase that 
Unicron made of the original Megatron.  He'd been reformatted to a 
Pred himself and the two got into a fight.  There was an accident, 
and the two fused.  Boom!  Instant super-robot!  And Hydras is, from 
what I've seen, even crazier than his component parts."
